trans-unit.source: Represents a variable-length stream of binary data to be stored in or retrieved from a database.
The byte array to be stored or retrieved.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure, setting the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value" /> property to the contents of the supplied byte array.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" />.
Concatenates two specified <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> values to create a new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> that is the concatenated value of x and y.
`x` will appear first in the resulting <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary>, followed by `y`.
trans-unit.target: `x` 将在随后出现第一个显示<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary>后, 跟`y`。

trans-unit.source: Compares this instance to a specified object and returns an indication of their relative values.
This method is implemented to support the <xref:System.IComparable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现此方法是为了支持<xref:System.IComparable>接口。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object to be compared to this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
Compares this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object to the supplied <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object and returns an indication of their relative values.
A signed number that indicates the relative values of this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure and the object.
<list type="table"><listheader><term> Return value
</term><description> Condition
</description></listheader><item><term> Less than zero
</term><description> The value of this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object is less than the object.
</description></item><item><term> Zero
</term><description> This <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object is the same as object.
</description></item><item><term> Greater than zero
</term><description> This <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object is greater than object.
-or-
The object is a null reference.
The object to be compared to this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
Compares this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object to the supplied object and returns an indication of their relative values.
A signed number that indicates the relative values of this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure and the object.
<list type="table"><listheader><term> Return value
</term><description> Condition
</description></listheader><item><term> Less than zero
</term><description> The value of this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object is less than the object.
</description></item><item><term> Zero
</term><description> This <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object is the same as object.
</description></item><item><term> Greater than zero
</term><description> This <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object is greater than object.
-or-
The object is a null reference.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
Concatenates two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structures to create a new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
The concatenated values of the <paramref name="x" /> and <paramref name="y" /> parameters.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structures to determine whether they are equal.
The object to be compared.
Compares the supplied object parameter to the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object.
<see langword="true" /> if object is an instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> and the two are equal; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structures to determine whether they are equal.
<see langword="true" /> if the two values are equal.
Otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
If either instance is null, then the <see langword="SqlBinary" /> will be null.
Returns the hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
A <see langword="string" /> that indicates the XSD of the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structures to determine whether the first is greater than the second.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" /> if the first instance is greater than the second instance.
Otherwise <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" />.

If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structures to determine whether the first is greater than or equal to the second.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" /> if the first instance is greater than or equal to the second instance.
Otherwise <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" />.

If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />.
Indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure is null.
This property is read-only.
<see langword="true" /> if <see langword="null" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 <see langword="null" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling Null Values](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/handling-null-values.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理 Null 值](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/handling-null-values.md)。

trans-unit.source: The position of the byte to be retrieved.
Gets the single byte from the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value" /> property located at the position indicated by the integer parameter, <paramref name="index" />.
If <paramref name="index" /> indicates a position beyond the end of the byte array, a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlNullValueException" /> will be raised.
This property is read-only.
The byte located at the position indicated by the integer parameter.
trans-unit.target: 位于由整数参数指示的位置中的字节。

trans-unit.source: To avoid raising a <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlNullValueException>, always examine the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A> property and the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Length%2A> property before reading this property.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免引发<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlNullValueException>，始终检查<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A>属性和<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Length%2A>之前读取此属性的属性。

trans-unit.source: The property is read when the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value" /> property contains <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Null" />
\- or -
The <paramref name="index" /> parameter indicates a position byond the length of the byte array as indicated by the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Length" /> property.
Gets the length in bytes of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value" /> property.
This property is read-only.
The length of the binary data in the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的二进制数据的长度<see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value" />属性。

trans-unit.source: To avoid raising a <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlNullValueException>, always examine the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A> property before reading the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Length%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免引发<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlNullValueException>，始终检查<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A>属性在读取之前<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Length%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Length" /> property is read when the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value" /> property contains <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Null" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structures to determine whether the first is less than the second.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" /> if the first instance is less than the second instance.
Otherwise <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" />.

If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structures to determine whether the first is less than or equal to the second.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" /> if the first instance is less than or equal to the second instance.
Otherwise <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" />.

If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structures to determine whether they are not equal.

A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are not equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are equal.

If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />.
Represents a <see cref="T:System.DBNull" /> that can be assigned to this instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
`Null` functions as a constant for the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary> structure.
trans-unit.target: `Null` 充当的常量<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary>结构。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling Null Values](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/handling-null-values.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理 Null 值](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/handling-null-values.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object.
Concatenates the two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> parameters to create a new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
The concatenated values of the <paramref name="x" /> and <paramref name="y" /> parameters.
`x` will appear first in the resulting <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary>, followed by `y`.
trans-unit.target: `x` 将在随后出现第一个显示<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary>后, 跟`y`。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Concat%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Concat%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structures to determine whether they are equal.

A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are not equal.

If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Equals%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Equals%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Converts to a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure to be converted.
Converts a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure to a <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array.
A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlGuid" /> structure to be converted.
Converts a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlGuid" /> structure to a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlGuid" /> structure to be converted.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.ToSqlGuid?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.ToSqlGuid?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structures to determine whether the first is greater than the second.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" /> if the first instance is greater than the second instance.
Otherwise <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" />.

If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.GreaterThan%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.GreaterThan%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object.

A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" /> if the first instance is greater than or equal to the second instance.
Otherwise <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" />.

If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.GreaterThanOrEqual%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.GreaterThanOrEqual%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The array of bytes to be converted.
Converts an array of bytes to a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure that represents the converted array of bytes.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structures to determine whether they are not equal.

A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are not equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are equal.

If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />.

trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.NotEquals%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema" />.

This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary> 实例被强制转换为 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Converts this instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> to <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlGuid" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlGuid" /> structure.
Converts this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> object to a string.
A string that contains the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" />.
If the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value" /> is null the string will contain "null".
Gets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
This property is read-only.
The value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 值<see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary" />结构。

trans-unit.source: To avoid raising a SqlNullValueException, always examine the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A> property before reading the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免引发 SqlNullValueException，始终检查<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A>属性在读取之前<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value" /> property is read when the property contains <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Null" />.
